name: A SAIL AND COURAGE
description:
They say all you need to become a great adventurer is a sail and lots of courage.

Long ago, we burned and mined and farmed the land away, throwing it to the ocean. And the ocean rose to meet us.

Those with riches took to the skies. Those with sails took to the seas.

-

This story was made using Twine 2.3.14. A very quick play with narrative choices and a storybook feel.  Best played full-screen with your favourite soft tunes on <3
